name: The Ouroboros Agency
description:
Welcome to the Ouroboros Agency.

Made for the Black and White game jam, this sandbox was made in 5 days.

Worked on it for maybe half the time I put aside for it, and had to cut many features such as:

  • Dialog system with the Skeleton and the Wheel.
  • More idle behaviors for the environmental effects that are alive.
  • Folders of Souls and the Soul-Sending Wheel mechanic.
  • Some quiet music would have been nice, but I couldn't find any free ones online that fit.

Regardless, I hope it makes you smile! Thanks for playing.
